      • intentForMessage

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public android.content.Intent intentForMessage(@NotNull
                                                                    android.content.Context context,
                                                                    @Nullable
                                                                    android.os.Bundle bundle,
                                                                    @NotNull
                                                                    Message message)

        Creates an Intent for correctly displaying a Sailthru Mobile Message Activity.

        Parameters:
        context - The Application Context.
        bundle - Any bundled extras to add to the Intent.
        message - The Message to display in MessageActivity.
        Returns:
        An Intent to launch the MessageActivity with a specific Message.

      • intentForMessage

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public android.content.Intent intentForMessage(@NotNull
                                                                    android.content.Context context,
                                                                    @Nullable
                                                                    android.os.Bundle bundle,
                                                                    @NotNull
                                                                    java.lang.String messageId)

        Creates an Intent for correctly displaying a Sailthru Mobile Message Activity.

        Parameters:
        context - The Application Context.
        bundle - Any bundled extras to add to the Intent.
        messageId - The Id of the Message to display in MessageActivity.
        Returns:
        An Intent to launch the MessageActivity with a specific Message.
